name: Square Quest: A Memory Based Platformer
name_original: Square Quest: A Memory Based Platformer
description:
Square Quest may appear basic. However it thrives off of deception. Nothing is quite how it looks…

Square Quest is a memory based platformer. In this game. Failure is progression. Just memorise. You will get make it through the perils eventually.

Special Thanks!

Games Liek
